EmailTemplate.name: 18-CSP-VoLTE-Email-Business nurture-T0022I.Email 1 - API Use Case
EmailTemplate.subject: Win revenue from new apps and services built on VoLTE
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Win revenue from new apps and services built on VoLTE From identifying and blocking nuisance calls, to conference calls launched from a browser, now there’s an easy way to enable innovative voice-based services. Nokia helps you work with app developers to enrich your customers’ voice and video communication experiences. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia’s networks business or its third-party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
